body_html:
Thanks so much @soumith for putting this together!

I agree that allowing different input and output sizes would be great; for object detection the common case is to take a relatively large feature map for the entire image and produce several smaller crops for objects.

In addition to supporting different input and output sizes, it would also be convenient to allow multiple crops from the same input; however it's probably sufficient to support nonsequential Tensors that have been expanded on the minibatch dimension.
